Name: Spinout Drifter
About the game: Narrative: Welcome to the Rocking Reefs! An island many only can dream to visit! Play as a wild tourist, doing their best to drift away into fame. Gameplay: Check out the competition! As the Rocking Reefs are home to some of the most competitive drifters on the planet. With many records to beat, as well as plenty of tracks to race across. A tropical paradise for some, and a police state for othersâ€¦ As you're attempting to set your records, be careful of the reckless police that will stop at nothing to end your drifting career. Do your best to set these records, but be wary of the Reef Police! Customization: Customize the look of your car, and upgrade your vehicle in ways that suit your playstyle!
